channel.title: OneGet on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community
channel.description: Recent content in OneGet on PowerShell Magazine | For the most powerful community

item.title: PowerShell OneGet: Gist-As-A-Package
item.description: This article will cover a new powerful feature delivered in the PowerShell 5.0 November Preview. This feature is OneGet. OneGet is a unified package manager for package management systems.
